name: Centered
description:
CENTERED is an action game written in BASIC. 

The square will move diagonally downward left or right.

Steer it to avoid hitting the walls and reach the bottom.

There are a total of 16 screens with each one getting narrower.

If you reach the bottom right in the center there is a 5 point bonus.
The game ends when you hit a wall or finish the 16th screen.
